title: Mashou no Kao (The Two Facials of Eve)
synopsis: Keiichi Hayama always dreamed about hot sex with his childhood sweetheart, but one day she transformed in his dream into a mysterious beauty with perfect breasts and a seductive eyes. The next afternoon, Keiichi came back from school to find that very same woman masturbating in his room!
staff: [['Mink', ['Original Creator']], ['Sano, Hiroaki', ['Music']], ['Katahira, Shinji', ['Art Director']], ['Yoshiki, Masayuki', ['Key Animation']]]
